rows.label: tev027101_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027101_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Suriella what she's doing here.

rows.label: tev027101_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027101_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Suriella if she's heard any interesting rumors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027101_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Suriella what she's doing here.

rows.label: tev027101_MSG0001
rows.name: Oh, have you come to see the town helper?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027101_MSG0002
rows.name:
...I'm sorry, what? You don't know who the town
helper is?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027101_MSG0003
rows.name: It's me, silly![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027101_MSG0004
rows.name:
I'm a Mediator, but I started dabbling on the side—
I teach weapon skills, offer equipment tips,
deliver lost items, give life advice...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027101_MSG0005
rows.name:
Folks just started calling me the "town helper."
I kind of like it, to be honest.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027101_MSG0101
rows.name: Hey, guess what? Now I'm doing couples therapy![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027101_MSG0102
rows.name:
The two I'm helping now are clearly very upset.
I'm trying to give them a little perspective and calm
them down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027101_MSG0103
rows.name:
It's not easy to understand how someone feels—
like, REALLY understand them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027101_MSG0104
rows.name:
But I can still empathize, offer some grounded advice,
and try to get them talking civilly to each other again.
Really, it's the least a town helper can do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027101_MSG0111
rows.name:
I guess it's a sign the human race has finally recovered
from the crash and settled in, because people are
starting to get up to no good.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027101_MSG0112
rows.name:
I've heard stories of BLADEs screwing over their
teammates in some really nasty ways just so they can
keep the rewards to themselves. Awful...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027101_MSG0113
rows.name:
You be really careful when you choose your team.
Don't let anyone near you that you don't trust.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027101_MSG0201
rows.name:
Oh, she was just telling me about her hometown and
the family she had to leave behind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027101_MSG0202
rows.name:
It's sad. I may be the town helper, but one thing I
can't do is take people back to Earth to see the people
they lost.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027101_MSG0203
rows.name:
Still, she says it's nice just to be able to talk about it
with someone now and then, so I'm happy to oblige.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027101_MSG0204
rows.name:
I wish I could have seen the...um...Earth town that
she called home.[ST:wait ]
